# Compas Dataset Analysis

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Library imports

```{r}
library(RSQLite)
```

## Dataset cleaning

```{r}
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "compas.db")

all_data <- data.frame(dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM compas"))
RK_violence <- data.frame(dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM compas where type_of_assessment = 'Risk of Violence' "))
RK_recidivism <- data.frame(dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM compas where type_of_assessment = 'Risk of Recidivism' "))
```
